pr_title: Adds escaping of Lucene extended grammar extension characters

timeline.message:
Escape additional regex characters to cope with non-standard options enabled on Lucene regex interface

Signed-off-by: Graham Wallis <graham_wallis@uk.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: do we need to handle double quote?
timeline.author: planetf1
